Reviews.Title: “Dirty ugly , i've been in better motels”
Reviews.Author: Surrealounge
Reviews.Content: well , i stayed there cause it was close to work... since time i arrived i could see that the hotel was dirty, the staff at the front desk wasnt nice at all, the room looked like a motel room ... what would i expect for 50dll right? the room smelled like sewers , on the second day i found some garbage on the aisle and told the staff about it, they didnt do anything till friday . i didn't bother about trying the 6dll breakfast because a mall is at one side and there are some nice restourants like sanbonrs. if youre short on cash i know better motels where you can stay in...

HotelInfo.Name: Ibis Mexico Perinorte
HotelInfo.Address: Hacienda sierra Vieja 2 Centro Comercial Perinorte | Colonia Hacienda del Parque, Cuautitlan, Mexico City 54769, Mexico
